downfall:FairyPotion.NAME: Fairy Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Heals to 30% of Max HP instead of dying, removing this effect.

downfall:NeowInvulnerable.NAME: God of Life
DESCRIPTIONS: Cannot be killed.  Ends your turn and retreats to recover when reduced to 0 HP.

downfall:TotemInvulnerable.NAME: Living Wall
DESCRIPTIONS: Cannot die unless all other Heads are at 1 HP.  Dies if any other Head dies.

downfall:ExhaustCardsPower.NAME: Forgetful
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, choose a card to Exhaust.

downfall:PoisonResist.NAME: Poison Resistance
DESCRIPTIONS: Poison does not bypass your Block, triggers at the end of your turn, and loses half its stack.

downfall:InverseBias.NAME: Recovering
DESCRIPTIONS: Gains 2 Focus at the end of each turn.

downfall:NeowBuff.NAME: Neow's Vigor
DESCRIPTIONS: Gains Strength and Dexterity at the end of the round.

downfall:WatcherCripplePower.NAME: Fall from Grace
DESCRIPTIONS: more unblocked Attack damage to apply -4 Strength to Watcher when she next enters Divinity or plays Ragnarok.
Watcher will lose 4 Strength to Watcher when she next enters Divinity or plays Ragnarok.
